LanguageData.HemogenicMicrocompressor.label: water microcompressor
LanguageData.HemoFangs.label: hydro-fangs
LanguageData.HemoFangs.description: a pair of retractable, spring-loaded plasteel canines, connected to a vacuum pump. The user can bite an enemy, extend the fangs, and suck the water from the target, hydrating themselves directly.\n\nCan only be installed on water drinkers.
LanguageData.HemogenicActivator.label: water filtration glands
LanguageData.HemogenicActivator.description: a set of artificial water filtration glands that allow a water drinker to more efficiently process water.\n\nCan only be installed on water drinkers.
